protocol.name: P-AFFY-2
protocol.text: Labeling of samples was carried out according to the manufacturer’s standard protocol

protocol.name: P-MTAB-3209
text: Arabidopsis thaliana plants were grown at 23°C and 65% rel. humidity on soil. Light conditions: Mixture of Cool White and Gro-Lux Wide Spectrum fluorescent lights, with a fluence rate of 125 to 175 µmol m-2 s-1.
(Parameters: time unit = days, temperature unit = C)

protocol.name: P-MTAB-3210
protocol.text: Plants were shifted from short day (SD; 8hr light, 16 hr darkness) to long day (LD; 16 hr light, 8 hr darkness) to synchronously induce flowering.

protocol.name: P-MTAB-3211
text: Total RNA was isolated from plant material using Plant RNeasy columns (Qiagen) according to the manufacturers instructions.

protocol.name: HK_PETN_NTG_SCAN
text: After washing steps the Microarray slides were scanned using a ScanArray 4000 system and the ScanArray 4.0 software (Perkin-Elmer; Rodgau – Jügesheim, Germany) at 10 m pixel size. Laser intensity was varied between 90% and 100% and photomultiplier tube sensitivity between 60% and 70% to optimize signal to background intensities.
(Parameters: Scanning hardware = ScanArray 4000XL [PerkinElmer], Scanning software = ScanArray Express [PerkinElmer])
